name: YourMorningRoutine
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your morning routine
des:
Chronic pain has been a huge dilemma in our society and because of that Power Through Motion wanted to create an easy stretching routine to help you relieve the chronic pain you are experiencing. So we focused on the most common areas, back, knees, hips, elbow, ankles/feet, shoulders, and sciatica.

Each problematic area has four exercises to follow, and the entire routine will only take 20 minutes out of your day. If you find you have more than one area, then it will take you 20 minutes for each program you follow.

This is our first Alexa Skill, and we want you to be a part of making this even better; if you find something that is needing to be changed please let us know. The more we know the better our skill can help you.


The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
